mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UserSongCommentStuts(userName,mail,songCommentStuts,songCommentId) values (#{userName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{songCommentStuts,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{songCommentId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: Select * From UserSongCommentStuts WHERE mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} And songCommentId = #{songCommentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM UserSongCommentStuts WHERE songCommentId = #{ songCommentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
